message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"Excuse me, may I ask...?","sentence":"请问，这里有水吗？","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a person politely asking a question to another person near a small table with a glass of water. The background is subtly surreal with faded buildings and gentle light, giving a calm, slightly otherworldly feel. All characters are Asian, in simple modern clothing. The overall mood is friendly and curious.","sentence_translation":"Excuse me, is there water here?"}
